snippet: By instituting a postseason basketball tournament, the league is choosing a dose of excitement and TV exposure over a guarantee of sending its best team to the N.C.A.A. tournament....

headline.main: The Surprisingly Lively Home of a Controversial Artist
headline.print_headline: The Surprisingly Lively Home of a Controversial Artist

lead_paragraph: By instituting a postseason basketball tournament, the league is choosing a dose of excitement and TV exposure over a guarantee of sending its best team to the N.C.A.A. tournament.
